name: dotKey
short_description: A simple, fully customisable, programmable and intuitive typing tutor / assistant. It teaches children and adults alike how to effectively use and manage their keyboards, as efficiently as possible. It is in the form of a web application that allows users to be able to access it on any of their devices that use a mechanical keyboard. The application’s ability to be simple / intuitive to use, as well as highly powerful means that it is a useful tool for both educators, people new to computing, or people that just want to learn how to be more efficient with their keyboard, as well as develop good typing habits.
